page.title: 18The Midland Bank St.Davids.
page.content: The Midland Bank branch at St.Davids employs five people .In the winter they have about fifty customers a day but during the summer the daily rate rises to two hundred and fifty customers a day.The Griffin savers account has been a great success with Midland Bank because it has caused the children to open more and more accounts with the Midland branches. The bank has recently obtained a new computer terminal which helps with the bank's accounts.The computer is the most important piece of equipment in the bank as it stores addresses, balances and rates of interest.We asked the bank manager Mr. David Howell if there had ever been a robbery at the bank.He said"There has never been a robbery at this bank."
